import React, { useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" import "./AddProduct.css" const AddProduct = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", description: "", price: "", image: "" }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.post("http://localhost:5000/api/products", formData) alert("Product added successfully") setFormData({ name: "", description: "", price: "", image: "" }) } return (
